name: appletrailerviewer
description: Apple Trailer Viewer is a HTML5/JS sample application that I built to teach myself how to use the latest and greatest tools for modern web application development.
author: Andre Fuller

dependencyReasons.backbone: Backbone supplies structure to JavaScript-heavy applications by providing models with key-value binding and custom events, collections with a rich API of enumerable functions, views with declarative event handling, and connects it all to your existing application over a RESTful JSON interface.
dependencyReasons.backbone.marionette: Marionette is a composite application library for Backbone.js that aims to simplify the construction of large scale JavaScript applications. It is a collection of common design and implementation patterns found in applications.
dependencyReasons.backbone.paginator: A pageable, drop-in replacement for Backbone.Collection called Backbone.PageableCollection.
dependencyReasons.bootstrap: Sleek, intuitive, and powerful front-end framework for faster and easier web development.
dependencyReasons.font-awesome: Font Awesome is a full suite of 675 pictographic icons for easy scalable vector graphics on websites.
dependencyReasons.google-fonts-webpack-plugin: Download Google fonts to webpack build folder using google-webfonts-helper or use CDN to integrate with html-webpack-plugin.
dependencyReasons.jquery: jQuery is a fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library.
dependencyReasons.moment: A lightweight JavaScript date library for parsing, validating, manipulating, and formatting dates.
dependencyReasons.popper.js: A library used to position poppers in web applications.
dependencyReasons.proxied-fetch: Proxied Fetch is a tiny Fetch API wrapper with 0 dependencies that lets you bypass CORS limitations by simply proxy-ing your requests through known CORS proxy services.
dependencyReasons.typeahead.js: Inspired by twitter.com's autocomplete search functionality, typeahead.js is a flexible JavaScript library that provides a strong foundation for building robust typeaheads.
dependencyReasons.underscore: Underscore.js is a utility-belt library for JavaScript that provides support for the usual functional suspects (each, map, reduce, filter...) without extending any core JavaScript objects.
